Package: de.unigoettingen.sub.be.ous.print.util.resolver

[Groovy] Class StackingResolver

    • de.unigoettingen.sub.be.ous.print.util.resolver.StackingResolver
    • All Implemented Interfaces and Traits:
      URIResolver

      @CompileStatic
//@TypeChecked
@Log4j
class StackingResolver
extends Object

      A stacking resolver, wich acts as a meta resolver for a list of given resolvers. Note, that the first resolver which doesn't return null is used. exceptions are catched and silently ignored

      Authors:
      cmahnke
